meanings.sent1: Many cartoonists draw funny characters for comic strips.
meanings.sent2: The cartoonists at the newspaper create political cartoons.
meanings.sent3: The cartoonists had a competition to see who could draw the silliest animal.
meanings.sent4: In the world of art, cartoonists are the magicians who bring drawings to life.
meanings.sent5: Children love to watch cartoonists draw their favorite characters at the fair.

meanings.sent1: The room was filled with talented cartoonists from all over the world.
meanings.sent2: The cartoonists gathered to discuss the latest trends in animation.
meanings.sent3: During the event, the cartoonists traded sketches as souvenirs.
meanings.sent4: The group of cartoonists worked together like a team of superheroes.
meanings.sent5: The convention was buzzing with excitement as cartoonists showcased their work.
